Animated comedy, with the voices of Bill Hader, Anna Faris and James Caan.(n)

programme.title: The Haunted Mansion
programme.desc: Overworked estate agent Jim Evers takes his beleaguered family to look round an isolated, crumbling mansion - but the resident ghosts are not especially pleased to see the visitors. Comedy based on the Disney theme-park ride, starring Eddie Murphy, Terence Stamp, Jennifer Tilly and Marsha Thomason.(n)

programme.title: Hocus Pocus
programme.desc: A teenager in Salem, Massachusetts, breaks into a spooky house on Halloween and accidentally resurrects three witches who have been dead for 300 years. The sorceresses are soon causing chaos while seeking a suitable sacrifice for a ritual to give them eternal youth. However, an old foe - a boy they turned into a cat - is on hand to help stop their mischief. Supernatural Disney comedy, with Bette Midler, Sarah Jessica Parker, Kathy Najimy and Omri Katz.(n)

programme.title: The Secret of Moonacre
programme.desc: When her father dies, 13-year-old Maria is sent to live with her eccentric uncle in Moonacre Manor. The youngster finds herself drawn into a magical conflict when she learns she is destined to become the last Moon Princess and is charged with unearthing secrets of the past to prevent the mystical kingdom disappearing forever. Fantasy adventure set in the 19th century, starring Dakota Blue Richards, Ioan Gruffudd and Tim Curry.(n)

programme.title: Marked for Death
programme.desc: A former narcotics agent decides it is time to retire and settle down after his partner is killed. However, his peaceful retirement comes to an abrupt end when a villainous drug dealer known as Screwface tries to kill his sister and her daughter. The enraged operative pursues the crime lord to Jamaica in search of vengeance. Action thriller, starring Steven Seagal, Basil Wallace and Joanna Pacula.

programme.title: Sudden Death
programme.desc: Terrorists seize control of an ice-hockey stadium in the middle of a match attended by the US vice president. Taking the politician hostage, they threaten to blow up the building at the final whistle - but a resourceful former fireman takes it upon himself to thwart their dastardly plot. Action thriller, starring Jean-Claude Van Damme, Powers Boothe, Raymond J Barry and Whittni Wright.

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: The head of a search and rescue team whose children were kidnapped by her ex-husband hunts obsessively for a girl gone missing in the desert. However, her search is interrupted by news that her spouse has been found - but the children he took are nowhere to be found. Fact-based drama, starring Linda Hamilton and Kevin Kilner.

programme.title: Come And Find Me
programme.desc: A man's desperate search for his missing girlfriend takes him down an increasingly dark and dangerous path. Mystery thriller, starring Aaron Paul, Annabelle Wallis and Garret Dillahunt.

programme.title: Hijacked
programme.desc: FBI agent Gretchen Blair finds herself caught in the middle of an elaborate mid-air heist. Thriller, starring Denise Richards, Dolph Lundgren and Chuck Liddell.

programme.title: Breakdown
programme.desc: A founding member of a secret society of assassins struggles to cope, as memories of his past misdeeds cause panic attacks and his family starts to fall apart. When he breaks down during the torture of a captive, his employers fear he is no longer reliable - and threaten the lives of his wife and daughter. Action thriller, starring Craig Fairbrass and James Cosmo.

programme.title: Vertical Limit
programme.desc: A wildlife photographer is forced to master his fears and the elements as he leads an expedition to climb K2, the world's second highest mountain, on a desperate mission to rescue his estranged sister and her fellow mountaineers, who have fallen into a crevasse. Action adventure, starring Chris O'Donnell, Bill Paxton, Scott Glenn and Robin Tunney.

programme.title: Wall Street: Money Never Sleeps
programme.desc: Ruthless stockbroker Gordon Gekko is released from prison after eight years, reinventing himself as an author and lecturer warning against the dangers of the financial system. Gekko helps a young banker get revenge on the company that drove his mentor to suicide, but as always, has a crooked agenda of his own. Oliver Stone's sequel to his 1980s drama, with Michael Douglas, Shia LaBeouf and Carey Mulligan.

programme.title: Anon
programme.desc: In a world without anonymity or crime, a detective meets a woman who threatens their security. Sci-fi thriller from Gattaca and In Time director Andrew Niccol, starring Clive Owen, Amanda Seyfried and Colm Feore.

programme.title: Captain Phillips
programme.desc: An American cargo ship sets a dangerous course around the coast of Somalia, while inland, four men are pressed into service as pirates by the local warlords. The captain is taken hostage when the raiding party hijacks the vessel, resulting in a tense five-day crisis. Fact-based thriller, starring Tom Hanks and Barkhad Abdi.

programme.title: Ocean's Eleven
programme.desc: A suave ex-convict assembles a gang of sophisticated crooks to pull off a daring heist. He intends to rob three of Las Vegas's biggest casinos simultaneously - and also win back his estranged wife, who is now dating the ruthless owner of all three gambling establishments. Steven Soderbergh's crime comedy, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Matt Damon and Bernie Mac.

programme.title: Ocean's Twelve
programme.desc: The crooks reunite when an old enemy catches up with them and demands they repay the money they stole from him three years previously. In response, the gang comes up with another larcenous plan - but reckons without the interventions of a fellow thief and a sultry Interpol agent. Crime caper sequel, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Don Cheadle.

programme.title: RoboCop
programme.desc: A police officer in a future Detroit ravaged by crime is seemingly killed in the line of duty, but is rebuilt as a law-enforcing cyborg by the corporation that has taken over running the force. He begins to remember his human life and seeks to bring his killers to justice - a mission that leads him to turn on his corrupt corporate masters. Sci-fi thriller, starring Peter Weller, Nancy Allen, Ronny Cox and Miguel Ferrer.

programme.title: RoboCop 2
programme.desc: The cybernetic law enforcer returns to battle a deranged drug lord. Meanwhile, he is unaware the corporation that created him has scheduled his replacement by a more powerful version. To complete the new cyborg, they need a human brain, and a renegade scientist secretly implants the injured drug lord's brain into the robot, transforming it into an uncontrollable killing machine. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Peter Weller, Nancy Allen, Tom Noonan and Belinda Bauer.

programme.title: Sam Churchill: Search for a Homeless Man
programme.desc: A seemingly straightforward missing persons case draws a private investigator into a battle against the members of a child pornography ring, who are holding a teenager he has been hired to find. Thriller, starring John Schneider, Robyn Lively, Alex Rocco and Rudy Ramos.

programme.title: Escobar: Paradise Lost
programme.desc: A Canadian surfer on holiday in Colombia falls in love with a local girl, only to discover to his horror that her uncle is the notorious drug kingpin Pablo Escobar. He finds himself forced to become part of Escobar's family business, putting his life on the line as he faces the dangerous reality of the international cocaine trade. Thriller, starring Benicio Del Toro and Josh Hutcherson.

programme.title: Inside Man
programme.desc: A police hostage negotiator is called in when a robbery turns into a siege. The chairman of the bank involved is worried the mastermind behind the heist is set to disclose secrets he needs to stay hidden, so he enlists the help of a political fixer. However, the elaborate nature of the thief's plan looks set to keep him one step ahead of the law, and causes problems for the detective assigned to rectify the situation. Spike Lee's thriller, with Denzel Washington, Clive Owen, Jodie Foster, Christopher Plummer, Willem Dafoe and Chiwetel Ejiofor.

programme.title: Max Payne
programme.desc: A tormented cop searches in vain for the man who killed his wife while also investigating a series of murders connected to an experimental drug that causes nightmarish hallucinations. However, he finds himself pursued by a vengeful woman who thinks he was involved in the death of her sister. Action thriller, based on the video game, starring Mark Wahlberg, Mila Kunis and Beau Bridges.

programme.title: The Mexican
programme.desc: A petty crook finds himself in a tricky situation when he tries to smuggle an antique gun from Mexico into America for his Mob boss. As events begin to spiral out of control, his girlfriend's displeasure and a pursuing hitman only add to the would-be bootlegger's woes. Comedy thriller directed by Gore Verbinski, with Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, James Gandolfini, Gene Hackman and JK Simmons.

programme.title: Get Rich or Die Tryin
programme.desc: An inner-city drug dealer puts his life of crime behind him after a near-fatal shooting to pursue a new career as a rap artist. Unfortunately, when he performs songs inspired by his shady past, his former criminal associates do not take kindly to having their misdeeds immortalised in music. Drama, starring Curtis `50 Cent' Jackson, Terrence Howard and Ashley Walters.

programme.title: Four Brothers
programme.desc: When their adoptive mother is killed in a robbery, her four sons reunite and swear vengeance on the murderers. But the background to her apparently random death turns out to be more complex than it first appeared, as the trail leads to corrupt cops and a notorious local gang boss. Thriller, starring Mark Wahlberg, Tyrese Gibson, Andre Benjamin, Garrett Hedlund, Chiwetel Ejiofor and Terrence Howard.

programme.title: American Made
programme.desc: In the 1980s, US pilot Barry Seal becomes a drug-runner for the CIA during a clandestine operation. Biopic, starring Tom Cruise, Domhnall Gleeson and Sarah Wright.

programme.title: Brawl In Cell Block 99
programme.desc: A former boxer is blackmailed into performing a prison hit by a ruthless drug kingpin. Crime thriller, starring Vince Vaughn, Jennifer Carpenter and Don Johnson.

programme.title: Rise Of The Footsoldier 3
programme.desc: Notorious gangster Pat Tate rises through the ranks of Essex's criminal underworld. Prequel, starring Craig Fairbrass, Terry Stone and Roland Manookian.

programme.title: Hard Eight
programme.desc: An unsuccessful gambler is befriended by a professional conman who offers to teach him the tricks of the trade. Delighted, he accepts - but an unscheduled romance with a waitress threatens his new life. Paul Thomas Anderson's crime drama, starring Philip Baker Hall, Gwyneth Paltrow, Samuel L Jackson and Philip Seymour Hoffman.(n)

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: Fugitive serial killer Dr Hannibal Lecter has gone into hiding as an academic in Italy, but a disfigured victim is determined to find him and inflict a gruesome revenge. FBI agent Clarice Starling is once again drawn into the doctor's deadly orbit as she finds herself being used as bait for the avenger's trap. Ridley Scott's thriller sequel, starring Anthony Hopkins, Julianne Moore, Gary Oldman and Ray Liotta.(n)

programme.title: Deep Family Secrets
programme.desc: A girl sets out on a personal quest to discover the truth about her mother's alleged abduction, and uncovers a tangled tale of adultery, incest and murder. Thriller, starring Richard Crenna, Angie Dickinson and Meg Foster.(n)

programme.title: First Kill
programme.desc: A desperate father is blackmailed into helping a criminal gang evade a corrupt police chief. Action thriller, starring Bruce Willis, Hayden Christensen and Ty Shelton.(n)

programme.title: Gran Torino
programme.desc: Misanthropic Korean War veteran Walt leads an isolated existence, and has a tense relationship with his family and nothing but contempt for his neighbours. When a teenager attempts to steal his prized car, he ends up trying to reform the thief, making a connection with the boy's relatives and defending them from a street gang. Drama, directed by and starring Clint Eastwood. With Christopher Carley and Bee Vang.(n)

programme.title: Out of Sight
programme.desc: A charming bank robber breaks out of jail and takes a female US Marshal hostage. Managing to escape, she sets out to track him down as he prepares for one last job - but as the chase intensifies, so do their feelings for each other. Steven Soderbergh's romantic crime drama, based on Elmore Leonard's novel, with George Clooney, Jennifer Lopez, Ving Rhames and Don Cheadle.(n)

programme.title: Contraband
programme.desc: Successful international smuggler Chris Farraday turns his back on a life of crime to raise a family. However, his brother-in-law crosses a powerful drug lord, who forces Chris to transport billions of dollars of counterfeit money into the US, or his wife and children will be killed. Crime thriller, starring Mark Wahlberg, Kate Beckinsale, Giovanni Ribisi and Ben Foster.(n)

programme.title: Road to Perdition
programme.desc: Devoted husband and father Michael Sullivan leads a secret life as a hitman, but faces a crisis when his son witnesses his involvement in a killing. The lad promises to keep his mouth shut, but one of Sullivan's fellow gangsters wipes out the rest of his family - forcing father and son to go on the run together. Sam Mendes' crime drama set in Depression-era Chicago, starring Tom Hanks, Paul Newman, Jude Law, Daniel Craig and Jennifer Jason Leigh.(n)

programme.title: War Dogs
programme.desc: Twentysomething gun runners David Packouz and Efraim Diveroli win a $300million contract from the Pentagon to arm America's allies in Afghanistan. Fact based comedy-drama, starring Miles Teller, Jonah Hill and Bradley Cooper.(n)

programme.title: Ocean's Eleven
programme.desc: A suave ex-convict assembles a gang of sophisticated crooks to pull off a daring heist. He intends to rob three of Las Vegas's biggest casinos simultaneously - and also win back his estranged wife, who is now dating the ruthless owner of all three gambling establishments. Steven Soderbergh's crime comedy, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Matt Damon and Bernie Mac.(n)

programme.title: Ocean's Twelve
programme.desc: The crooks reunite when an old enemy catches up with them and demands they repay the money they stole from him three years previously. In response, the gang comes up with another larcenous plan - but reckons without the interventions of a fellow thief and a sultry Interpol agent. Crime caper sequel, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Don Cheadle.(n)

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: Danny Ocean rounds up his band of crooks for one last heist. Gang member Reuben has been left traumatised and in a coma after being double-crossed by crooked casino owner Willy Bank, and Danny decides that payback is in order. He plans a scheme that will leave Bank penniless, but needs the help of an old enemy. Comedy crime caper sequel, with George Clooney, Al Pacino, Brad Pitt, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Elliott Gould.(n)

programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: In a future blighted by mass infertility, the human race is one generation from extinction and the world has plunged into chaos. In a totalitarian Britain, a jaded former activist tries to protect the first woman to become pregnant in nearly 20 years. However, a militant underground group plans to use her for its own ends. Thriller, starring Clive Owen, Michael Caine and Julianne Moore.

programme.title: Monster Hunt
programme.desc: Mortals and creatures set out to capture a young creature born to a human father and a monster queen. Fantasy adventure, starring Baihe Bai, Boran Jing and Wu Jiang. In Mandarin.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on the Sky Cinema channels, plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Don't Breathe
programme.desc: A trio of thieves break into the house of a blind man who is not as helpless as he seems, and their hopes of walking away with a massive fortune do not go to plan. Horror, starring Stephen Lang, Jane Levy and Dylan Minnette.

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The masked avenger stalks the streets of Gotham City, waging a nightly war against the criminal element. However, he may have met his match when the city's crime syndicate is taken over by the crazed Joker, who plans to poison the populace with toxic chemicals. Tim Burton's comic-book adventure, starring Michael Keaton, Jack Nicholson and Kim Basinger.

programme.title: The Conjuring 2
programme.desc: Horror sequel, starring Vera Farmiga and Patrick Wilson. Paranormal investigators battle sinister supernatural forces in London.

programme.title: Annabelle: Creation
programme.desc: Twelve years after the death of their little girl, a dollmaker and his wife welcome a nun and several girls from an orphanage into their home. There they become the target of the craftsman's possessed creation, Annabelle. Horror, starring Anthony LaPaglia, Samara Lee and Miranda Otto.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: A team of scientists on the International Space Station fight for survival when an intelligent alien life form is brought on board. The creature, nicknamed Calvin, proves it will do anthing to stay alive, and the crew risk everything to ensure it does not make its way to Earth. Sci-fi thriller, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Rebecca Ferguson, Ryan Reynolds and Ariyon Bakare.

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The masked avenger stalks the streets of Gotham City, waging a nightly war against the criminal element. However, he may have met his match when the city's crime syndicate is taken over by the crazed Joker, who plans to poison the populace with toxic chemicals. Tim Burton's comic-book adventure, starring Michael Keaton, Jack Nicholson and Kim Basinger.

programme.title: The Conjuring 2
programme.desc: Horror sequel, starring Vera Farmiga and Patrick Wilson. Paranormal investigators battle sinister supernatural forces in London.

programme.title: Annabelle: Creation
programme.desc: Twelve years after the death of their little girl, a dollmaker and his wife welcome a nun and several girls from an orphanage into their home. There they become the target of the craftsman's possessed creation, Annabelle. Horror, starring Anthony LaPaglia, Samara Lee and Miranda Otto.

programme.title: Mother
programme.desc: A couple's relationship is tested when uninvited guests arrive at their home, disrupting their peaceful existence. Drama, starring Jennifer Lawrence, Javier Bardem, Ed Harris and Michelle Pfeiffer.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: A team of scientists on the International Space Station fight for survival when an intelligent alien life form is brought on board. The creature, nicknamed Calvin, proves it will do anthing to stay alive, and the crew risk everything to ensure it does not make its way to Earth. Sci-fi thriller, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Rebecca Ferguson, Ryan Reynolds and Ariyon Bakare.

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: A sinister alien parasite brings out the web-slinging hero's darker side, filling him with thoughts of revenge on his uncle's murderer, the shape-shifting Sandman. Meanwhile, he also has to contend with the challenge of his best friend following in his father's villainous footsteps - and a jealous rival developing superpowers of his own. Superhero sequel, with Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst and James Franco.

programme.title: Solo: A Star Wars Story Special
programme.desc: Preview of the latest film in the sci-fi franchise.

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: Nasa discovers an asteroid the size of Texas is on a collision course with Earth, so a drilling expert is recruited to train a team of misfits to transport a nuclear device into outer space to destroy it - but having had no experience of space travel, the reluctant astronauts find themselves seriously out of their depth. Sci-fi thriller, with Bruce Willis, Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, Michael Clarke Duncan, Billy Bob Thornton and Steve Buscemi.

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant planet malfunctions. As woken travelling companions Jim Preston and Aurora Lane fall in love, they are soon on a collision course with more technical problems and a dark secret. Fantasy adventure, starring Jennifer Lawrence, Chris Pratt and Michael Sheen.

programme.title: The Wicker Man
programme.desc: A devoutly Christian Scottish police officer travels to a remote island to investigate the disappearance of a missing girl. As his investigations are disrupted at every turn, the detective is horrified to see the population have embraced an ancient pagan lifestyle, and begins to fear they may intend to sacrifice the child in an occult ritual. Horror, starring Edward Woodward, Christopher Lee and Britt Ekland.

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: Teenager Sam Witwicky is treated to his first car by his dad, but it turns out to be an alien scout with a life of its own. Before long, the vehicle embroils Sam in a long-running intergalactic war between two factions of giant shape-changing robots, which have come to Earth to find a mystical cube that grants infinite power to its possessor. Michael Bay's sci-fi action adventure, inspired by the toy franchise, with Shia LaBeouf, Megan Fox, Josh Duhamel, Jon Voight and John Turturro.

programme.title: It Comes at Night
programme.desc: In the aftermath of a deadly plague, one desperate family agrees to shelter another, but can they be trusted? Horror thriller, starring Joel Edgerton, Christopher Abbott and Carmen Ejogo.

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: Nasa discovers an asteroid the size of Texas is on a collision course with Earth, so a drilling expert is recruited to train a team of misfits to transport a nuclear device into outer space to destroy it - but having had no experience of space travel, the reluctant astronauts find themselves seriously out of their depth. Sci-fi thriller, with Bruce Willis, Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, Michael Clarke Duncan, Billy Bob Thornton and Steve Buscemi.

programme.title: The Wicker Man
programme.desc: A devoutly Christian Scottish police officer travels to a remote island to investigate the disappearance of a missing girl. As his investigations are disrupted at every turn, the detective is horrified to see the population have embraced an ancient pagan lifestyle, and begins to fear they may intend to sacrifice the child in an occult ritual. Horror, starring Edward Woodward, Christopher Lee and Britt Ekland.

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: Teenager Sam Witwicky is treated to his first car by his dad, but it turns out to be an alien scout with a life of its own. Before long, the vehicle embroils Sam in a long-running intergalactic war between two factions of giant shape-changing robots, which have come to Earth to find a mystical cube that grants infinite power to its possessor. Michael Bay's sci-fi action adventure, inspired by the toy franchise, with Shia LaBeouf, Megan Fox, Josh Duhamel, Jon Voight and John Turturro.

programme.title: It Comes at Night
programme.desc: In the aftermath of a deadly plague, one desperate family agrees to shelter another, but can they be trusted? Horror thriller, starring Joel Edgerton, Christopher Abbott and Carmen Ejogo.

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant planet malfunctions. As woken travelling companions Jim Preston and Aurora Lane fall in love, they are soon on a collision course with more technical problems and a dark secret. Fantasy adventure, starring Jennifer Lawrence, Chris Pratt and Michael Sheen.(n)

programme.title: The Neighbour
programme.desc: When a Mississippi man comes home to find his girlfriend missing, he soon discovers the disturbing truth about his secretive neighbour. Horror thriller, starring Josh Stewart, Bill Engvall and Alex Essoe.(n)

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: The Man of Steel embarks on a mission to destroy every nuclear weapon on the planet. However, his arch-enemy Lex Luthor sees the chance to rid himself of the superhero by creating a deadly radioactive henchman who causes havoc around the world. Comic-book adventure sequel, starring Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Mark Pillow and Margot Kidder.(n)

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: A clumsy teenager develops superhuman powers after a genetically engineered spider bites him. At first his fantastic skills delight him, but his elation is severely tempered by a family tragedy, prompting him to dedicate his talents to combating evil. However, he faces a baptism of fire in the form of crazed villain the Green Goblin. Comic-book superhero adventure, with Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Willem Dafoe, James Franco and Rosemary Harris.(n)

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: Peter Parker continues his fight for justice, but unrequited love and personal worries take their toll and he is tempted to abandon his web-slinging alter ego. However, the arrival of deadly new bad guy Doctor Octopus plunges him into a race against time to save New York. Comic-book adventure sequel, with Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Alfred Molina, James Franco and Rosemary Harris.(n)

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: A sinister alien parasite brings out the web-slinging hero's darker side, filling him with thoughts of revenge on his uncle's murderer, the shape-shifting Sandman. Meanwhile, he also has to contend with the challenge of his best friend following in his father's villainous footsteps - and a jealous rival developing superpowers of his own. Superhero sequel, with Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst and James Franco.(n)

programme.title: War for the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: Caesar and his apes are forced into a lethal clash with an army of humans led by a ruthless colonel. Fantasy adventure, starring Andy Serkis, Woody Harrelson and Steve Zahn.(n)

programme.title: Bad Match
programme.desc: An internet-dating playboy finds his life spiralling out of control when he meets a woman online. Thriller, starring Jack Cutmore-Scott, Lili Simmons and Noureen DeWulf.(n)

programme.title: Don't Breathe
programme.desc: A trio of thieves break into the house of a blind man who is not as helpless as he seems, and their hopes of walking away with a massive fortune do not go to plan. Horror, starring Stephen Lang, Jane Levy and Dylan Minnette.(n)

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: After an African American photographer and his white girlfriend visit her wealthy parents, he suspects there's more to the locals than meets the eye. Psychological thriller, starring Daniel Kaluuya, Allison Williams, Bradley Whitford and Caleb Landry Jones.(n)

programme.title: War for the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: Caesar and his apes are forced into a lethal clash with an army of humans led by a ruthless colonel. Fantasy adventure, starring Andy Serkis, Woody Harrelson and Steve Zahn.(n)

programme.title: Bad Match
programme.desc: An internet-dating playboy finds his life spiralling out of control when he meets a woman online. Thriller, starring Jack Cutmore-Scott, Lili Simmons and Noureen DeWulf.(n)

programme.title: Marshland
programme.desc: Premiere. Two ideologically opposed homicide detectives from Madrid are reprimanded and sent to an isolated town to investigate the disappearance and murder of two teenage girls during the town's festivities. While attempting to overcome their differences, they have to try and track down the killer who has has been murdering teenagers in the town for several years. Thriller, set in 1980, starring Raul Arevalo and Javier Gutierrez. In Spanish.

programme.title: The Tall Stranger
programme.desc: A Union soldier struggles to recover from a violent encounter with a gang of lawless cattle rustlers, but his recuperation is cut short as he works to ensure the safety of a group of Confederate homesteaders journeying north at the end of the Civil War. Western based on a novel by Louis L'Amour, starring Joel McCrea, Virginia Mayo, Michael Ansara and Michael Pate.

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: A farmer in need of money agrees to guard a notorious outlaw until the train arrives to transport him to jail. Meanwhile, the pair are holed up in a hotel, where his prisoner plays mind games with him - and the villain's cohorts are waiting outside ready to engineer an escape. Western adapted from a novel by Elmore Leonard, with Van Heflin, Glenn Ford, Felicia Farr and Leora Dana.

programme.title: The Wonderful Country
programme.desc: A solitary gunman lies low for years in Mexico hiding out from the American authorities, until circumstances force him to return to the US - where he reluctantly agrees to take on dangerous work with a team of Texas Rangers patrolling the border. Western, starring Robert Mitchum, Julie London, Pedro Armendariz and Jack Oakie.

programme.title: Posse from Hell
programme.desc: Bandits invade a frontier town, rob the bank, kill the sheriff and kidnap a local woman. A tough gunslinger who was a friend of the dead lawman takes on the job of bringing them to justice, but the only one of the townspeople willing to help is a naive banker determined to prove his worth. Western, starring Audie Murphy, John Saxon, Vic Morrow and Lee Van Cleef.

programme.title: The Abyss
programme.desc: An American nuclear submarine is sunk after a collision with a mysterious object, and the US government asks oil workers to help with the rescue. However, when they and a Navy Seal team arrive at the location of the vessel, a series of strange incidents leads to an encounter with aliens living in the depths. James Cameron's sci-fi thriller, starring Ed Harris, Michael Biehn and Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio.

programme.title: Momentum
programme.desc: Premiere. A retired thief is persuaded to carry out one last diamond heist by her former partner, only to get mixed up in a murder. With a ruthless assassin on her trail, she must unmask the secret conspiracy that has manipulated her into the line of fire. Action thriller, starring Olga Kurylenko, Morgan Freeman and James Purefoy.

programme.title: The Sweeney
programme.desc: An insubordinate detective and his loyal partner set out to stop a series of robberies across London. While they try to bring the criminals to justice, they come under investigation themselves as their unorthodox methods are met with disapproval from their superiors. Crime thriller based on the 1970s TV series, with Ray Winstone, Ben Drew, Damian Lewis and Hayley Atwell.

programme.title: Return of the One-Armed Swordsman
programme.desc: Fang Gang is now happily married and living a quiet life when emissaries of eight gang leaders begin touring the country, inviting blade-fighting teachers to a competition to establish who is the deadliest of all. The catch is that most entrants will die and refusal to participate means summary execution. Fang Gang is soon forced to take on each of the eight, all of whom possess different, but equally lethal, supernatural abilities with their chosen weapons. Martial arts action sequel, starring Jimmy Wang. In Mandarin.

programme.title: The Rare Breed
programme.desc: An English widow decides to fulfil her cattle farmer husband's final wish of introducing the Hereford breed to America. She finds a cattleman in Texas willing to help, but first she and her daughter must transport their prize bull across the wilderness, with the aid of a sceptical ranch hand. Romantic comedy Western, starring Maureen O'Hara and James Stewart.

programme.title: North to Alaska
programme.desc: Gold prospector Sam travels to Seattle to fetch his partner George's fiancee. When he discovers she has married someone else, Sam takes it upon himself to find a suitable replacement. Unfortunately, his attempts to bring the substitute bride and George together do not go to plan, and a conman is trying to get his hands on their gold. Comedy Western, starring John Wayne, Stewart Granger, Capucine and Ernie Kovacs.

programme.title: Man Without a Star
programme.desc: A wandering cowboy and his naive travelling partner are hired by an ambitious ranch owner, who wishes to expand her territory at the cost of her struggling neighbours. The drifter sympathises with the plight of the other farmers, but disapproves of the methods they intend to use to mark their territory. King Vidor's Western, starring Kirk Douglas, Jeanne Crain, William Campbell, Richard Boone and Claire Trevor.

programme.title: Carry On Teacher
programme.desc: A headmaster hopes to land a more prestigious job at a better school, but his pupils do not want him to leave. When two inspectors pay a visit, the mischievous students see a chance to sabotage his career plans with a series of pranks. Comedy, starring Ted Ray, Kenneth Connor, Charles Hawtrey and Kenneth Williams.

programme.title: X-Men: The Last Stand
programme.desc: The mutant heroes return to face a battle on three fronts. Arch-enemy Magneto is back with an army of followers, while a corporation has created a drug that permanently robs mutants of their powers. Meanwhile, their former ally Jean Grey has returned from the dead as the destructive and seemingly unstoppable Phoenix. The third instalment of the superhero saga, starring Hugh Jackman, Ian McKellen, Famke Janssen, Halle Berry and Kelsey Grammer.

programme.title: Red
programme.desc: A retired CIA agent survives an assassination attempt and realises something in his past has made him a target. He sets out to reunite the members of his old hit squad to find out who is trying to kill them and why, but in the process, uncovers dangerous secrets. Action thriller, with Bruce Willis, Morgan Freeman, John Malkovich and Helen Mirren.

programme.title: Triple 9
programme.desc: A gang of corrupt cops that carries out bank robberies under the noses of their law-abiding colleagues is blackmailed into carrying out a seemingly impossible heist by the Russian Mob. They realise that the only way to carry out the crime is to kill a police officer as a diversion. Crime thriller, starring Chiwetel Ejiofor, Casey Affleck, Kate Winslet and Woody Harrelson.

programme.title: Your Highness
programme.desc: Dashing Prince Fabious is the greatest hero in the kingdom, while his younger brother Thadeous is a lazy, self-centred fool. When the princess whom Fabious is due to marry is kidnapped by an evil wizard, the two brothers must go on a dangerous quest to rescue her, with a little help from a vengeful warrior woman. Fantasy comedy, with Danny McBride, James Franco and Natalie Portman.(n)

programme.title: 7th Cavalry
programme.desc: An army officer is branded a coward for failing to fight in the Battle of the Little Bighorn, and is unable to convince anyone that official business had detained him. In a bid to repair his damaged reputation, he leads a cavalry detail to retrieve the dead from the battlefield. Western, starring Randolph Scott, Jay C Flippen and Jeanette Nolan.(n)

programme.title: The 300 Spartans
programme.desc: The ruler of the Persian empire vows to expand his realm by conquering Greece. The king of Sparta steps forward to defend his homeland and the other kingdoms of Greece, but when he is betrayed by a political council, he finds himself without an army and must fend off the vast invading army with a mere 300 warriors. Historical drama, starring Richard Egan, Ralph Richardson and Diane Baker.(n)

programme.title: Elephant Walk
programme.desc: A woman struggles to come to terms with her tea plantation owner husband's obsession with his dead father. Melodrama, starring Elizabeth Taylor, Peter Finch, Dana Andrews and Abraham Sofaer.(n)

programme.title: The Buccaneer
programme.desc: A general charged with the defence of New Orleans in 1812 learns the British are sending a vast fleet to retake the city. His only hope is to form an alliance with a notorious pirate - but while the buccaneer's loyalties are to his homeland, his crew urges him to side with the invaders. Remake of Cecil B DeMille's classic swashbuckling adventure, directed by Anthony Quinn, starring Yul Brynner, Charlton Heston, Claire Bloom and Charles Boyer.(n)

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Agent J investigates the unauthorised landing of a spacecraft and discovers a malevolent alien disguised as a lingerie model is on the verge of destroying humanity. His only hope of stopping her diabolical plot is to restore the memory of his retired partner K - but his former mentor takes more than a little convincing. Sci-fi comedy sequel, directed by Barry Sonnenfeld, starring Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones, Rosario Dawson, Lara Flynn Boyle, Johnny Knoxville, Rip Torn and Tony Shalhoub.(n)

programme.title: The Gunman
programme.desc: A mercenary goes into hiding after successfully carrying out a hit on an African politician that sparks a series of uprisings and violent acts. He re-emerges years later, only to become the latest target of his former colleagues. Crime drama, starring Sean Penn, Idris Elba, Ray Winstone, Javier Bardem and Mark Rylance.(n)

programme.title: Lockout
programme.desc: A government agent is framed for murder, and sentenced to a prison on board a space station. Before he can be sent there, a riot takes place in the penitentiary and the convicts seize control, holding the president's daughter hostage. The condemned man is offered a pardon if he can rescue her. Sci-fi thriller, starring Guy Pearce and Maggie Grace.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy offers shelter to a gypsy couple with a sick child, but is shocked by the reaction of the rest of his family.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The validity of the Waltons' claim to their land is questioned, so John-Boy takes a trip to the city to raise the $200 required for his family to register their right, while his younger siblings do their bit at home. Richard Thomas stars.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Mrs Oleson's wealthy nephew arrives in Walnut Grove to stay with the Ingalls family. The youngster, who has a troubled past, soon learns a few lessons about life and love.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Pregnant Caroline worries that the baby she is carrying will not be the boy her husband has always wanted.

programme.sub-title: All Good Dogs Go to Heaven
programme.desc: Jim cares for a dying dog that is pining for its owner, Joanie meets a celebrity and Syd attempts to save a teenage girl's life.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd receives a valentine from an ex-boyfriend and tries to help a friend of Joanie's, a drug addict who could be HIV positive. Jim enlists Robbie's help and Kyle fulfils a dream.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: An old man, still grieving over the loss of his wife, is placed in a nursing home. His outlook on life changes when he has the opportunity to fulfil his wife's biggest wish to visit Hollywood.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Part one of two. Jonathan reunites two childhood friends, who immediately decide to elope - but their hasty wedding is fraught with difficulties. Helen Hunt guest stars.

programme.title: Working Miracles
programme.desc: A janitor wakes from a coma to discover he has gained the life-changing ability to heal people just by touching them. He soon becomes a minor celebrity, but the gift takes its toll on his health and relationship with his fiancee. Drama, starring Eddie Cibrian, Lisa Sheridan and Darcy Rose Byrnes.

programme.title: A Kind of Loving
programme.desc: A factory worker gets his girlfriend pregnant, forcing them to endure years of misery and dashed hopes as they marry and move in with her disapproving, nagging mother. John Schlesinger's drama, starring Alan Bates, June Ritchie and Thora Hird.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jason falls in love with Curt's sister, and neglects his studies to help her develop her musical talents. However, the relationship does not end well.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Laura unwittingly befriends Walnut Grove's new banker while out fishing, and is stunned when he suggests she is only being kind to him so he will give her father a loan.

programme.title: McBride: Tune in for Murder
programme.desc: An obnoxious radio DJ is killed and his co-presenter is accused of the crime. McBride takes on the case, and becomes convinced of the defendant's innocence - especially as the murder weapon is nowhere to be found. Mystery, starring John Larroquette, Marta DuBois and Matt Lutz.

programme.title: Murder Among Friends
programme.desc: A would-be actress resolves to prove her friend is innocent of murdering his own father for an inheritance. She enlists the aid of a washed-up private eye whose career has been destroyed by a lawsuit. Detective thriller, starring Greg Evigan, Donnamarie Recco, Jennie Raymond, Jeff Geddis and James Thomas.

programme.title: Jack Hunter: The Lost Treasure of Ugarit
programme.desc: A heroic archaeologist journeys to Syria to uncover the truth behind the murder of his mentor, but finds himself pursued through Egypt and Turkey in search of ancient treasure. Adventure, the first in a trilogy of films, starring Ivan Sergei and Joanne Kelly.

programme.title: Hush
programme.desc: A domineering mother goes to extreme lengths to lure her son away from his New York career to take over the running of the family country estate in Kentucky - and ensure his girlfriend falls pregnant and produces his heir. Thriller, starring Jessica Lange, Gwyneth Paltrow, Johnathon Schaech, Nina Foch and Debi Mazar.

programme.title: Hush
programme.desc: A domineering mother goes to extreme lengths to lure her son away from his New York career to take over the running of the family country estate in Kentucky - and ensure his girlfriend falls pregnant and produces his heir. Thriller, starring Jessica Lange, Gwyneth Paltrow, Johnathon Schaech, Nina Foch and Debi Mazar.

programme.title: PopFan
programme.desc: A pop star hoping to reinvent her public image crashes her car during a storm, and is rescued by a mysterious stranger, who takes her to his home in a secluded lighthouse to recuperate. She discovers she has fallen into the clutches of an unstable obsessive fan, who cannot tell the difference between her music videos and reality. Thriller, starring Chelsea Kane and Nolan Gerard Funk.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: When Verdie Grant learns her daughter is graduating from college, she feels embarrassed by the fact that she never learned to read or write. She asks John-Boy to teach her, on the condition that he keeps it a secret. Richard Thomas stars.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Budding writer John-Boy helps a local blacksmith compose a poem that will win the hand of his sweetheart. Starring Richard Thomas.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: I'll Be Waving as You Drive Away - Part One
programme.desc: Part one of two. Just as Mary falls in love with newcomer Seth Barton, her eyesight begins to worsen. Charles takes her to an optometrist, but the news is not good - Mary's vision cannot be saved and she will soon go blind. In denial, Charles does not tell his daughter until she finds to her horror she is completely blind. Mary becomes very bitter over her predicament and having to rely on others for basic needs. Drama, starring Michael Landon.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: I'll Be Waving as You Drive Away - Part Two
programme.desc: Part two of two. Mary is sent to a blind school in Iowa, where she meets Adam Kendall. She refuses to accept his help at first, but he eventually helps her learn to deal with her blindness. When Adam encourages Mary before her return to Walnut Grove, he says a key line that serves as the title of this episode. Meanwhile, the town of Walnut Grove faces bankruptcy as its citizens prepare to move out.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Jim faces temptation and Kyle is offered a job in Portland, while Syd misdiagnoses a baby's illness, bringing the full weight of the parents' anger down on her head.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Joanie announces that she's marrying Richie, but Lynda's carping, cynical comments make Syd wonder whether the pair really love each other.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Part two of two. Lizzy undergoes medical tests that reveal the extent of her condition, but decides to keep the truth from her new husband. Helen Hunt guest stars.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.sub-title: A Song for Jason - Part One
programme.desc: Part one of two. Jonathan and Mark help out at a camp for children with cancer, where they meet an angry teenage athlete and an overprotective mother. Giovanni Ribisi guest stars.

programme.title: Nora Roberts' Tribute
programme.desc: A former child star begins a relationship with her new neighbour while restoring her grandmother's old house. She is haunted by disturbing dreams that compel her to unravel the truth behind her grandmother's death, supposedly from a drug overdose, 30 years previously. Romantic mystery, with Brittany Murphy, Jason Lewis, Christian Oliver, Diana Scarwid and Tippi Hedren.

programme.title: Breach of Trust
programme.desc: A woman is devastated to learn a plane on which her husband was travelling has crashed, leaving him in a coma. However, the disaster leads to the revelation that he has been conducting a secret relationship with another woman, who did not survive the crash. What's more, they had a daughter. Drama, starring Roma Downey, William Russ and Jamie Rose.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Grandma is admitted to hospital, but Grandpa does not cope well with being away from her. Corabeth thinks Elizabeth is a bad influence on Aimee, and forbids them from being friends.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A talented player leaves the townsfolk convinced they will win an annual baseball game, but when they start betting on the event, his disapproving wife forbids him from taking part.

programme.title: McBride: Murder Past Midnight
programme.desc: The crusading lawyer is called up for jury duty in the case of a woman thought to have poisoned her wealthy husband. However, he ends up reluctantly agreeing to defend the accused when she is retried. Mystery, starring John Larroquette, Marta DuBois and Matt Lutz.

programme.title: McBride: The Chameleon Murder
programme.desc: An apparently straightforward murder case takes a strange turn when the victim is discovered to have a plethora of identities - prompting McBride to investigate in an effort to prove his client innocent of the killing. Crime drama, starring John Larroquette, Marta DuBois, Annie LaRussa and Devon Gummersall.

programme.title: Jack Hunter: The Quest for Akhenaten's Tomb
programme.desc: The heroic archaeologist is sent on a mission to recover an ancient artefact that could be used as a devastating weapon, but the Russian mafia is also searching for it. Second part of the adventure trilogy, starring Ivan Sergei and Joanne M Kelly.

programme.title: My Cousin Vinny
programme.desc: Two New York students travelling through Alabama think they have been arrested for shoplifting so admit their guilt - only to find they have in fact been charged with murder. Fortunately, one of the pair has a cousin who is a lawyer - but his ineptitude and inexperience could do more harm than good. Comedy, starring Joe Pesci, Marisa Tomei and Ralph Macchio.

programme.title: My Cousin Vinny
programme.desc: Two New York students travelling through Alabama think they have been arrested for shoplifting so admit their guilt - only to find they have in fact been charged with murder. Fortunately, one of the pair has a cousin who is a lawyer - but his ineptitude and inexperience could do more harm than good. Comedy, starring Joe Pesci, Marisa Tomei and Ralph Macchio.

programme.title: Taggart
programme.desc: A lawyer is shot dead, but despite the gun being left at the scene, there are few clues for the team to go on - until Reid and Burke visit the man's widow, who is surprisingly unmoved by her loss. It soon transpires she is having an affair with her late husband's business partner, and neither of them has an alibi for the time of the murder. Starring Blythe Duff, Alex Norton and John Michie.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy receives a proposal of marriage from his insecure friend Sarah. However, when he fails to take her seriously she elopes with another boy instead - and he sets out to find the errant couple before they tie the knot. Sissy Spacek guest stars.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Kind-hearted John-Boy gives up a date with a beautiful woman to accompany an elderly Scottish lady on the most important journey of her life.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: As Long as We're Together - Part One
programme.desc: Part one of two. The recession catches up with the Ingalls, forcing the family to seek fresh pastures - but fortunately the move brings them closer to Mary.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: As Long As We're Together - Part Two
programme.desc: Part two of two. Mary is proud of Laura for writing a card in Braille and announces at a party she has nothing to wish for, since she has everything she could possibly want.(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Sydney and Joanie discover their father has been seeing a mysterious woman, while Robbie falls for a student on the basketball team. With guest star Michelle Phillips.(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Jim has hallucinatory conversations with a talking dog, while Sydney goes on a blind date with a wealthy New Age guru and reacts badly to a doctor who stands in the way of a successful career in plastic surgery.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.sub-title: A Song for Jason - Part Two
programme.desc: Part two of two. Jonathan tries to persuade Jason's father to spend more time with his son, but finds he would rather forget the boy exists. Guest starring Giovanni Ribisi.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Mark asks God to make Jonathan a police officer. After 40 years, Jonathan becomes human, only to realise the harsh realities of being a cop and receive him an insight into Mark's more cynical outlook on life.(n)

programme.title: Tears in the Rain
programme.desc: An American woman tries to fulfil her mother's dying wish by delivering a letter to an English lord, who denies ever having known her. When she falls in love with his son, the suspicious aristocrat delves into the American's past - only to realise she may be his daughter. Romantic drama, starring Sharon Stone and Christopher Cazenove.(n)

programme.title: Run for Your Life
programme.desc: A woman and her two daughters are stalked by her abusive ex-husband, and she finds the law is unable to protect her from him. She begins to feel that her children's safety can only be guaranteed by the family going into hiding or resorting to murder. Fact-based thriller, starring Amy Smart and Mark Humphrey.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The Baldwin sisters' niece returns to America after living in Germany, and John Boy suspects she is running away from something terrible that happened there.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Although many in Walnut Grove think he's a crazy man in a haunted house, brave Laura befriends mysterious hermit Amos Pike and soon discovers the truth behind the rumours.(n)

programme.title: McBride: The Doctor Is Out, Really Out
programme.desc: The crusading lawyer takes on a custody case, only for his client to later confess to having murdered the psychiatrist who testified against him. However, when McBride shows up at the doctor's house, the body is nowhere to be found. Mystery directed by and starring John Larroquette, with Marta DuBois, Matt Lutz and Stephen Tobolowsky.(n)

programme.title: McBride: Tune in for Murder
programme.desc: An obnoxious radio DJ is killed and his co-presenter is accused of the crime. McBride takes on the case, and becomes convinced of the defendant's innocence - especially as the murder weapon is nowhere to be found. Mystery, starring John Larroquette, Marta DuBois and Matt Lutz.(n)

programme.title: Jack Hunter: The Star of Heaven
programme.desc: The heroic archaeologist pursues his arch-enemy Littmann across Europe, intent on thwarting his evil plan to salvage a deadly artefact. Final part of the adventure trilogy, starring Ivan Sergei, Thure Reifenstein and Joanne Kelly.(n)

programme.title: Catch and Release
programme.desc: Gray Wheeler moves in with some of her dead fiance's friends as she tries to deal with the tragedy, and begins to form a strong bond with his best buddy. However, just when she seems to be making progress in rebuilding her life, Gray makes a startling discovery involving a secret bank account and a mysterious massage therapist. Romantic comedy drama, starring Jennifer Garner, Timothy Olyphant and Juliette Lewis.(n)

programme.title: The Good Mistress
programme.desc: Sandy Cooper, a struggling alcoholic with a troubled past, moves to a new town in an attempt to start over. On arriving, she strikes up a passionate relationship with a charming stranger. However, it turns out her mysterious lover is actually her best friend's politician husband, and he will stoop to any means necessary to keep his indiscretions a secret. Thriller, starring Annie Heise and Antonio Cupo.(n)

programme.title: Taggart
programme.desc: Reid and the team leave their urban patch and head for the countryside to examine a farmer's suspicious death in a blaze - but instead of discovering a rural idyll, they find themselves in the middle of a war between the victim's neighbours. DCI Burke's private life comes to the fore as inquiries proceed, and a second fire gives the case added urgency. Blythe Duff, Alex Norton and Colin McCredie star.
